label: Double Enshroud
description: The core of Reaper's 2-minute burst: two back-to-back Enshroud windows with accelerated 1.5s GCDs, Lemure's Slice weaves, and Communio + Perfectio finishers.

steps.reasoning: Enter first Enshroud. Costs 50 Shroud gauge. Grants 5 Lemure Shroud stacks and accelerated 1.5s GCDs.
Refresh Death's Design inside the burst window. Ensures the 10% debuff doesn't fall off during the double Enshroud sequence.
First Enshroud GCD. 500 potency on a 1.5s recast — effectively doubled GCD speed. Grants Void Shroud for Lemure's Slice.
Enshroud oGCD weave. 240 potency. Consumes 2 Void Shroud stacks. Must be woven between Enshroud GCDs.
Alternating Enshroud GCD. Void Reaping and Cross Reaping alternate for optimal buff uptime. Grants Void Shroud.
Second Lemure's Slice weave. Consumes remaining Void Shroud stacks.
Enshroud finisher — 1100 potency magic damage. Used when 1 Lemure Shroud remains. Exits Enshroud state.
Post-Communio finisher — 1300 potency. Only available immediately after Communio. Highest single-hit in the rotation.
Enter second Enshroud immediately. 15s recast allows back-to-back Enshrouds within the Arcane Circle window.
Second Enshroud opener. Same accelerated GCD pattern as the first Enshroud.
Lemure's Slice weave in second Enshroud. Same pattern repeats.
Alternating Enshroud GCD in second window.
Final Lemure's Slice weave of the burst window.
Second Perfectio finisher. Ends the double Enshroud burst sequence.
